Bash(gh pr create --title "Add Zapdesk Lightning Tip App for Zendesk" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

This PR introduces Zapdesk, a Zendesk app that enables Lightning Network tips for support agents. The app allows customers to send Bitcoin tips to support agents via Lightning addresses.

### Key Features

- **Lightning Network Integration**: Send tips using Lightning addresses configured in agent profiles
- **QR Code Generation**: Display QR codes for easy mobile wallet scanning
- **Custom Tip Amounts**: Support for predefined and custom tip amounts
- **Configurable Comment Visibility**: Admin setting to control whether tip comments are public or private
- **LNURL Support**: Full LNURL protocol implementation for Lightning payments
- **Service Layer Architecture**: Clean separation of concerns with dedicated services for Zendesk and Lightning operations

### Changes Included

- Initial Zendesk App Framework setup with React
- Lightning address validation and LNURL payment flow
- QR code generation for Lightning invoices
- Message input for personalized tip messages
- Refactored business logic into service layer (zendeskService.js and lightningService.js)
- Added checkbox parameter for comment visibility control

### Technical Details

- Built using Zendesk Apps Framework v2.0
- React 18 for UI components
- Webpack for bundling and development server
- QRCode library for invoice display
- Bech32 encoding for Lightning addresses

## Test Plan

- [ ] Install app in Zendesk Support instance
- [ ] Configure Lightning addresses in agent user profiles
- [ ] Test sending tips with predefined amounts
- [ ] Test sending tips with custom amounts
- [ ] Verify QR code generation and scanning
- [ ] Test comment visibility setting (public vs private)
- [ ] Verify tip comments appear correctly on tickets
- [ ] Test with agents who don''t have Lightning addresses configured
